deploy:
```
$ heroku git:clone -a knightbot
$ cd knightbot
```
```
$ git add .
$ git commit -am "make it better"
$ git push heroku master
```

rules:
**SERVER RULES:**

`1.`  No spamming, even just saying the same thing over and over again.
`2.`  No advertising a server of your own.
`3.`  Respect one another. We do not tolerate abuse.
`4.`  If you have an issue with a user, let a Mod or Admin know.
`5.`  If you have any issues or suggestions, contact us in the suggestions channel.

*Failure to follow the rules will result in a punishment (mute/warn/kick/ban).*
